Text: hey almost 500 dl and noone comments.  is this shit passworded or drm; like most of onlyshares stuff or what, and if it is what is the password.

I've just downloaded it. It's good. Not great.
Worthy downloading.

Great movie but too low res. This is a nearly 3 hour movie compressed to just over 700 MB making it very soft and pixellated. This would be a great download if you plan to view it on your iPod, but otherwise it needs a file size of 1500-1800 MB to be viewable on a monitor or burnt to DVD. 
Thanks for putting it up OnlyShare, but I'd prefer it without so much compression.
This chick-quality is better than the video-quality.
